attributes.action: Tower Hamlets authority law enforcement tackle the drug dealing/using problems.
attributes.background: Residents and local business initiative to get the community together and expose the increased drug problem to local authorities aiming solutions for more efficient law-enforcement against Anti-Social behaviour and the growing health problems affecting the community in special Palmers Road E2 .

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. Your petition seems to be asking Tower Hamlets Council and the Metropolitan Police for action. 

You could contact the Mayor's Office for Policing and Crime about the problems caused by drugs and anti-social behaviour in your community. You can find out how to do that here:

https://www.police.uk/metropolitan/pcc/
